thread.title: PartsSource Expands Executive Team to Support Rapid Growth

author: cnbc.com
title: PartsSource Expands Executive Team to Support Rapid Growth
text:
Developer of Automated Supply Chain Management Solution Brings Group of Seasoned Healthcare Executives to Further Extend its Momentum
CLEVELAND--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- PartsSource , the only fully-integrated, curated supply chain dedicated to healthcare providers’ quality and value objectives, appointed four new members to its executive team to support its exceptional growth. Adding decades of healthcare supply chain, operational improvement and quality experience, appointments include Mike Maguire, Senior Vice President and Chief Supply Chain Officer; Guy Mansueto, Senior Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer; Mara Paré, Senior Director, Client Solutions; and Mike Poling, Vice President, GPO & Affiliate Networks.
“At PartsSource, we help our customers ensure that healthcare is always available to patients and resources are always available to clinicians by accelerating the supply chain and creating reliable outcomes for all our partners,” said Philip Settimi, M.D., President and CEO of PartsSource. “To fuel our growth in this emerging category and to continue offering the very best insights to our customers, we are continuing to build a strong team with deep experience in supply chain management, group purchasing, hospital operations and evidence-based decisions. We are thrilled to add the talents of Mike Maguire, Guy Mansueto, Mara Paré and Mike Poling to our growing team.”
Mike Maguire, a healthcare supply chain expert previously Vice President of Strategic Sourcing for the Group Purchasing division at Premier, Inc., will lead PartsSource’s supply chain and quality team. In his role, Maguire will work on behalf of 3,300 hospital clients to identify new product categories, develop rigorous supplier engagement and quality monitoring methods, and expand PartsSource’s four million SKUs to create streamlined distribution and acquisition of products across 6,000 suppliers .
Guy Mansueto, previously Vice President, Portfolio Management at IBM Watson Health, will use his more than 25 years of in-depth healthcare and growth and innovation experience to lead the go-to-market strategy, overall product strategy and global marketing for PartsSource’s technology-enabled procurement solutions for the healthcare supply chain market.
Mara Paré, former Operations leader of Clinical Engineering Services at Allina Health and UHS, specializes in delivering operational efficiencies in complex clinical environments. At PartsSource she will lead the client solutions team, which delivers cost and quality improvement through PartsSource’s technology, process analytics and on-demand procurement model.
Mike Poling joins PartsSource from Premier, Inc., where he served as a Regional Vice President focused on total cost management and quality. With more than 20 years of experience in software-led supply chain transformation, Poling will work with existing and new GPO partners to deliver member benefits of supply cost reduction, organizational efficiency and evidence-based best outcomes.
About PartsSource®
PartsSource is the leading provider of technology solutions engineered to eliminate friction from supply chain management. Combining a suite of software-enabled services with industry best practices, PartsSource empowers its customers to drive costs out of healthcare delivery. By automating the highly complex workflow associated with procurement, PartsSource delivers the industry’s only online, fully-integrated medical products and repair parts procurement marketplace. PartsSource facilitates millions of transactions annually by connecting over 6,000 OEMs and suppliers to over 3,000 hospitals and 12,000 clinical sites worldwide.
